title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 sees $342 refurb discount, DJI Osmo Mobile 3 $100, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by a 1-day Samsung Galaxy S21 refurb discount at $458 and more via Woot. That’s alongside the DJI Osmo Mobile 3 gimbal at $100 and more. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 sees $342 refurb discount, DJI Osmo Mobile 3 $100, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: As part of a 1-day sale at Woot, you can cash-in on a deep Samsung Galaxy S21 refurb discount at $458, plus DJI gear and more.
